 PREV PACKAGE   NEXT PACKAGE FRAMES    NO FRAMES    

Package uk.ac.liv.auction.event

Interface Summary
AuctionEventListener  
 

Class Summary
AgentPolledEvent An event that is fired whenever any agent is polled by an auction for its shout via the requestShout() method.
AuctionClosedEvent An event that is fired when an auction closes.
AuctionEvent Superclass for all types of auction event.
AuctionOpenEvent An event that is fired when an auction opens.
DayOpeningEvent An event that is fired at the beginning of every trading period.
EndOfDayEvent An event that is fired at the end of every trading period.
RoundClosedEvent An event that is fired at the end of each round.
RoundClosingEvent An event that is fired at the end of each round, but before round-ending processing.
RoundOpeningEvent An event that is fired at the beginning of each round.
ShoutPlacedEvent An event that is fired every time a shout is placed in an auction.
ShoutReceivedEvent An event that is fired every time a shout is received in an auction (may not be allowed to place eventually), in contrast to ShoutPlacedEvent, which represents a shout is received and placed.
TransactionExecutedEvent An event that is fired every time a good is sold in an auction.
